image.alt: Copper Creek Orthodontics team and smiling patients in office

paragraphs.text: Copper Creek Orthodontics is dedicated to helping patients of all ages achieve the beautiful, healthy straight smile they deserve. Our team uses modern techniques to create efficient, comfortable treatment plans tailored to your life.
From the first consultation to long-term retention, we focus on clear communication, convenient scheduling, and a friendly office experience that puts families at ease.

items.title: Advanced Technology

image.alt: Modern orthodontic technology in treatment room

items.text: We use proven systems like Damon brackets and clear aligners for efficient, comfortable treatment and predictable results.

items.title: Comprehensive Care

image.alt: Clear aligner treatment example

items.text: Full range of options including clear aligners, Damon braces, and orthognathic surgery coordination when needed.

items.title: Patient-First Team

image.alt: Friendly orthodontic team member greeting patient

items.text: A welcoming, well-trained staff emphasizes comfort, clear communication, and long-term relationships with patients.

items.title: Convenient Location

image.alt: Office location and community recognition

items.text: Easily accessible office at Towne Lake / Barker Cypress Rd with flexible scheduling and an online appointment request.

Home.title: Meet Dr. Virginia Bernal Noriega, DMD, MS

paragraphs.text:
Dr. Noriega is committed to providing our patients with superior orthodontic care using the latest in technology and medical advances. Her goal is to give you the best smile, with a philosophy that includes having fun in the office and establishing long-lasting friendships with our patients and their families.

Born in northern New Jersey, she did her undergraduate studies in biology and psychology at Rutgers University. She earned her doctorate in dental medicine from the University of Pennsylvania. In her fourth year of dental training, she completed an orthodontic externship in Madrid, Spain, where she learned about dentistry from a global perspective.

After graduating from dental school, Dr. Noriega entered a post-graduate residency in hospital dentistry at the University of Texas Health Science Center, Houston.

Dr. Noriega obtained her Master of Science degree from Loma Linda University in Southern California, where she earned her certificate in orthodontics and dentofacial orthopedics. She is a member of the Texas Dental Association, American Dental Association, Southwest Society of Orthodontists and the American Association of Orthodontists. She is an active supporter of our patients and contributes to many athletic teams and educational activities.

Dr. Noriega is fluent in Spanish. Her parents emigrated from Colombia, South America and reinforced the importance of family, tradition and the Latino culture throughout her life.

Dr. Noriega and her husband, Hector, are proud parents of Matthew and Alessandra. The Noriega family is always on the go: from traveling to the kids’ sports, they enjoy being active. When not treating patients, you may bump into Dr. Noriega around Towne Lake and Cypress.

image.alt: Dr Noriega side portrait

paragraphs.text: A full profile and headshot for Dr. Amaya are available on the Meet Dr. Amaya page. Visit the profile to learn more about her background and clinical approach.
We offer a full range of orthodontic care, from Damon brackets and clear aligners to corrective jaw surgery when orthodontics alone isn’t enough.

image.alt: Damon brackets smiling patient
Patient with clear aligners
Orthognathic surgery consult

paragraphs.text: Copper Creek Orthodontics is dedicated to helping orthodontic patients of all ages achieve the beautiful, healthy straight smile they deserve!

image.alt: Dr. Virginia Bernal Noriega headshot

paragraphs.text: Virginia Bernal Noriega, DMD, MS, is an orthodontist committed to superior patient care and modern orthodontic techniques. She focuses on creating long-term relationships with patients and their families, blending clinical excellence with a friendly, fun office environment.
Dr. Noriega supports patients of all ages and uses current technology to deliver efficient, comfortable treatment plans tailored to each person's needs.

image.alt: Dr. Noriega consulting with a patient in the treatment room

paragraphs.text: Dr. Noriega completed undergraduate studies in biology and psychology at Rutgers University, and earned her Doctor of Dental Medicine from the University of Pennsylvania. She completed a post-graduate residency in hospital dentistry at the University of Texas Health Science Center at Houston, and earned a Master of Science degree with a certificate in orthodontics and dentofacial orthopedics from Loma Linda University.
She is an active member of the Texas Dental Association, the American Dental Association, the Southwest Society of Orthodontists, and the American Association of Orthodontists.

image.alt: Dr. Noriega at a lectern speaking to colleagues

paragraphs.text: Born in northern New Jersey to Colombian parents, Dr. Noriega is fluent in Spanish and deeply values family and tradition. She and her husband Hector are parents to Matthew and Alessandra, and the family stays active with local sports and community events.

Dr. Noriega is a proud supporter of local student activities, including baseball and swim teams and many Cypress Ranch High School events. When not treating patients you may see her at youth sports or around Towne Lake.

og_meta.title: About Us | Copper Creek Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Learn about Copper Creek Orthodontics, Dr. Virginia Bernal Noriega, our family-focused care, community involvement, and office hours.

image.alt: Schedule an Ortho Appointment button image

paragraphs.text: Your first visit begins with a friendly welcome and a thorough orthodontic exam. We’ll take any necessary X-rays, review your smile goals, and explain treatment options so you understand recommended next steps. You can learn more about what to expect at: https://coppercreekortho.com/patient/first-visit/.

Please bring your insurance card, a list of current medications, and any prior dental records if you have them. When you’re ready to schedule, use our Appointment Request form: https://coppercreekortho.com/office/appointment-request/.

image.alt: Parent and child checking in at orthodontic reception

paragraphs.text: We accept most major insurance plans and will file claims electronically for your convenience. For questions or to confirm coverage, call (281) 463-6757 or text 281-475-2916.
Our office hours are Mon–Thu 8:00am–5:30pm and Fri by appointment. Fax: 281-463-7298, Email: info@coppercreekortho.com. Visit us at 9955 Barker Cypress Rd, Ste 225, Cypress, TX 77433.

image.alt: Family enjoying time together

og_meta.title: Get Started | Copper Creek Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Start your orthodontic journey with Copper Creek Orthodontics. Request an appointment, see what to bring for your first visit, and access new patient resources.

image.alt: Smiling patients of all ages in a bright orthodontic clinic

paragraphs.text: Nothing exudes beauty and confidence like a straight, vibrant smile. Damon brackets make that possible through advanced technology. Using our precise mix of cutting-edge tools and time-proven methods, we work to give you a smile you can be proud of.

image.alt: Two smiling teens with braces taking a selfie in a bright clinic

paragraphs.text: Clear aligners straighten teeth without wires and brackets, using a series of custom, removable trays. They’re virtually undetectable, so most people won’t even know you’re in treatment.

image.alt: Close-up of a smiling patient wearing a clear aligner

paragraphs.text: Corrective jaw surgery treats and corrects structural issues of the jaws and teeth. We coordinate closely with oral surgeons and specialists to plan comprehensive care that improves function and facial balance.

image.alt: Orthodontic consultation for orthognathic surgery planning

paragraphs.text: Maintain your new smile with custom retainers made for comfort and long-term stability. We offer removable and fixed options plus clear guidance on care to protect your results.

image.alt: Young woman holding an orthodontic retainer and smiling

paragraphs.text: Keep your retainers in great shape with our Retainer Club. Regular checks and professional cleanings help protect your investment and extend the life of your retainers.

image.alt: Close-up of retainers on a tray in a clinical setting

paragraphs.text: We evaluate children early so we can guide jaw growth and intercept developing problems. Starting treatment at the right time can simplify future care and improve long-term outcomes.

image.alt: Young child receiving an early orthodontic checkup

paragraphs.text: Teen-focused care uses discreet options like ceramic braces and clear aligners so treatment fits an active lifestyle. We prioritize comfort, efficiency, and predictable results for adolescents.

image.alt: Teenage patient smiling during an orthodontic visit

paragraphs.text: Whether it’s Invisalign<sup>®</sup> or clear braces, we offer flexible solutions that fit adult schedules and priorities. Treatments are tailored to blend seamlessly with work and lifestyle demands.

image.alt: Smiling adult patient in a modern orthodontic office
Family enjoying time together
